contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced|date=December 2009}} {{Infobox Album | <!-- See Wikipedia:WikiProject_Albums --> Name = Yllätysten yö | Cover = MattiNykänen-YllätystenYö.jpg | Type = [[Album]] | Artist = [[Matti Nykänen]] | Released = 1992 | Recorded = ??? | Genre = [[Pop music|Pop]] | Length = 46:23 | Label = Audiovox | Producer = Risto Kalle Närhi | Reviews = | Last album = | This album = ''Yllätysten yö''<br />(1992) | Next album = ''[[Samurai (Matti Nykänen album)|Samurai]]''<br />(1993) |}} '''''Yllätysten yö''''' (in English: ''Night of Surprises'') is the debut album by [[Matti Nykänen]] released in 1992. ==Track listing== #"Topless" #"Samaa nauhaa" #"V-tyyli" #"Mennään tanssimaan" #"Yllätysten yö" #"Kingi" #"Pidä varas" #"Jos sä haluut" #"Vain mäkimies voi tietää sen" {{DEFAULTSORT:Yllatysten Yo}} [[Category:Matti Nykänen albums]] [[Category:1992 debut albums]] {{1990s-pop-album-stub}}
